actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to promote savings and voluntarism by increasing the amount of contributions which may be made to an individual retirement account for homemakers who perform services for charities without compensation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to a maximum of $2,000 the amount which may be contributed to an individual retirement account on behalf of a homemaker who performs an average of six hours of volunteer services per week for charities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to promote savings and voluntarism by increasing the amount of contributions which may be made to an individual retirement account for homemakers who perform services for charities without compensation.
